item.title: [Spain][VoIP] - Network equipment upgrade
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 14, 22:00 UTC  -  Sep 15, 01:00 UTC

Sep 8, 09:28 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/09/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 15/09/2022 01:00 UTC
Service impact : VoIP service unavailable for Spanish customers.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be upgrading a network equipment.
As a consequence of the network operation, incoming and outgoing calls won't be available for Spanish VoIP customers during the maintenance.

Service impact : No impact is expected. And projects provisioning are not impacted.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing an internal maintenance in order to activate a Git feature: Minimized deployment when container resources change

item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Foundation upgrade to 3.22
item.description:
Sep 5, 07:12 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 5, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 30, 09:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 05/09/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 05/09/2022 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that the following informations :
o As for each Foundation upgrade, we'll recreate the whole region, meaning at some point we'll have almost twice the number of instances (the old in 3.21, the new ones in 3.22).
o All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, at one point each project will be reallocated resulting in a short interruption. Integrations and webhooks may fail during the maintenance, it's also possible to notice increased deployment times.
o Projects provisioning should not be impacted.

Root cause : Network issue

Sep 1, 08:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 01/09/2022 08:00 UTC
Service impact : ex3.mail.ovh.net is currently unreachable.
Reception and transmission of mail are unavailable. Mails waiting to be received are currently queued
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident

Unavailable access via webmail
Unable to send and receive mail.

Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating to determine the origin of this degradation

item.title: [P19][MX Plan] - homez.511
item.description:
Aug 25, 18:29 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/08/2022 12:20 UTC
End Time : 25/08/2022 18:00 UTC
Service impact : The backup is completed, all services are operationals again.
Root cause : The incident was related to a data storage access.

Aug 25, 16:39 UTC
Update - The backup is in progress, the restoration is 84% complete.

Aug 24, 18:18 UTC
Update - The back up has had a malfunction. We need to reload it.
This operation should continue for about 24 hours.

Aug 24, 09:31 UTC
Update - Some mail sent between 12:15 UTC and 22:00 UTC might be bounced to the sender.
The backup is still in progress.

Aug 24, 07:39 UTC
Update - The backup is still in progress, the restoration is 84% complete.

Aug 23, 18:13 UTC
Update - Our teams will restore a backup made on 23/08/22 at 01:15 UTC.
Emails in transit since 23/08/22 at 12:15 UTC will be delivered when mailbox are operational

Aug 23, 15:49 UTC
Identified - Our technical teams determined that the incident was related to a data storage access.
Our teams are working to restore the situation as soon as possible

Aug 23, 14:12 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/08/2022 12:20 UTC
Service impact : Reception, transmission, mailbox access and redirection may be unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident
